general.title: General Information
general.content: Letties prioritizes user privacy. The platform is designed to minimize the amount of processed information.

data.title: Data Processing
data.content: We only process a chosen nickname, which is necessary to identify the player during the game:
data.point1: The nickname is stored in the server's volatile memory only for the duration of the game session.
data.point2: Secure authorization tokens are used to maintain session continuity and are stored locally in your browser.

storage.title: Security and Storage
storage.content: The application does not use persistent databases. All game-related information is deleted after the session ends or the access token expires.

technical.title: Technologies and Cookies
technical.content: To ensure the proper functioning of the service and user convenience, we use the following technical solutions:
technical.point1: Cookies and LocalStorage: We use only technical (non-tracking) storage mechanisms to maintain the player session and remember language preferences.
technical.point2: Browser Notifications: With explicit user consent, the service may send system notifications regarding the game progress (e.g., your turn). These can be disabled at any time in the browser settings.
technical.point3: External Services: The service uses Google Fonts to provide a consistent interface appearance. No identification data is collected by us during the font retrieval process.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.point1: Users agree not to use nicknames that are offensive, vulgar, or violate the rights of others.
terms.point2: The service is provided for entertainment purposes 'as is'. We do not guarantee uninterrupted availability of the service.
terms.point3: The administrator reserves the right to terminate user sessions or modify game parameters at any time.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: Any inquiries or feedback regarding the service can be directed via GitHub profile: github.com/mi-cichon
